data.description: A modularized XV clone written in perl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I am developing a clone of the popular (around my place) xv image
    viewer. I choose the name Gtk2::CV because it's Gtk2 based and the
    application that gets installed is named CV. Therefore, the widgets
    and data file are put below the Gtk2::CV namespace.

    (And no, it won't be as featureful as the original xv, but faster
    and easier to extend).
